Bash(venvScriptspython -c "
import pymysql
conn = pymysql.connect\(host=''34.50.14.44'', port=3306, user=''swim_app'', password=''A7kQ9mT2eR4B'', db=''swim_dev''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# 1. 평생스포츠센터 facility 정보
cur.execute\(''SELECT id, name FROM facility WHERE name LIKE ""%평생%""''\)
print\(''=== Facility ===''\)
for row in cur.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)

# 2. 해당 facility의 2월 스케줄
cur.execute\(''''''
    SELECT s.id, s.day_type, s.season, s.valid_month, s.notice_id
    FROM swim_schedule s 
    JOIN facility f ON s.facility_id = f.id
    WHERE f.name LIKE ""%평생%"" AND s.valid_month = ""2026-02""
''''''\)
print\(''\\n=== Schedules ===''\)
for row in cur.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)

conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import pymysql
conn = pymysql.connect\(host=''34.50.14.44'', port=3306, user=''swim_app'', password=''A7kQ9mT2eR4B'', db=''swim_dev'', charset=''utf8mb4''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# 평일\(schedule_id=76\) 세션 확인
cur.execute\(''''''
    SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time, capacity, lanes
    FROM swim_session
    WHERE schedule_id = 76
    ORDER BY start_time
''''''\)
print\(''=== schedule_id=76 sessions ===''\)
for row in cur.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)

# Notice 원본 텍스트 확인
cur.execute\(''SELECT id, title, source_url, original_text FROM notice WHERE id = 33''\)
print\(''\\n=== Notice id=33 ===''\)
for row in cur.fetchall\(\):
    print\(f''id: {row[0]}''\)
    print\(f''title: {row[1]}''\)
    print\(f''source_url: {row[2]}''\)
    print\(f''original_text length: {len\(row[3]\) if row[3] else 0}''\)

conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import pymysql
conn = pymysql.connect\(host=''34.50.14.44'', port=3306, user=''swim_app'', password=''A7kQ9mT2eR4B'', db=''swim_dev'', charset=''utf8mb4''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# 모든 평생스포츠센터 관련 세션 확인
cur.execute\(''''''
    SELECT ss.schedule_id, s.day_type, ss.session_name, ss.start_time, ss.end_time, ss.capacity
    FROM swim_session ss
    JOIN swim_schedule s ON ss.schedule_id = s.id
    WHERE s.facility_id = 4 AND s.valid_month = ""2026-02""
    ORDER BY s.day_type, ss.start_time
''''''\)
print\(''=== All sessions for facility_id=4, 2026-02 ===''\)
for row in cur.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)

conn.close\(\)
")

import pymysql

import pymysql
conn = pymysql.connect\(host=''34.50.14.44'', port=3306, user=''swim_app'', password=''A7kQ9mT2eR4B'', db=''swim_dev'', charset=''utf8mb4''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# Notice 33 정보 확인
cur.execute\(''SELECT id, facility_id, title, source_url, valid_date, crawled_at FROM notice WHERE id = 33''\)

print\(f''facility_id: {row[1]}''\)
print\(f''title: {row[2]}''\)
print\(f''source_url: {row[3]}''\)
print\(f''valid_date: {row[4]}''\)
print\(f''crawled_at: {row[5]}''\)

conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import pymysql
conn = pymysql.connect\(host=''34.50.14.44'', port=3306, user=''swim_app'', password=''A7kQ9mT2eR4B'', db=''swim_dev'', charset=''utf8mb4''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# ENUM에 ''임시운영'' 추가
cur.execute\(''''''
    ALTER TABLE swim_schedule 
    MODIFY COLUMN season ENUM\(""하절기"", ""동절기"", ""임시운영""\) NULL
''''''\)
conn.commit\(\)
print\(''ENUM 수정 완료''\)

# 확인
cur.execute\(''SHOW COLUMNS FROM swim_schedule WHERE Field = ""season""''\)
print\(cur.fetchone\(\)\)

conn.close\(\)
")
